title: Did the U.S. Food and Drug Administration Announce a Ban on a Colgate Total Toothpaste Ingredient?
subtitle: A widely-shared article gets some crucial facts wrong about a September 2016 FDA ruling on the use of triclosan.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In June 2017, the FDA announced it would be banning the use of triclosan in various products, including Colgate Total.
